dji.sdk.api.Camera

Class DJICameraSystemState

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.Camera.DJICameraSystemState

  • public class DJICameraSystemState
extends java.lang.Object

    Camera System State Class

    By using this class, the current status could be immediately transported.
    Version:
    V2.1.0
    Author:
    DJI Software

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isCameraOverHeated
      The state for identifying whether the camera is over heated or not

      The state for identifying whether error occurs in sensors or not

      Whether the camera is connect to pc or not

      The state for identifying whether there is invalid operation or not

      The sdcard is exist or not

      The state for identifying whether there are some serious errors or not

      The state for identifying whether the camera would continuously take photo or not.
      boolean isTakingMultiPhoto
      The state for identifying whether the camera would take multi-photos or not.
      boolean isTakingOnePhoto
      The state for identifying whether the camera would take only one photo once or not.
      boolean isTakingRawPhoto
      The state for identifying whether the photo is taken as .raw file.
      boolean isTimeSynced
      Whether the time is synchronized with mobile devices or not
      boolean isUSBMode
      Whether the camera is in USB mode or not
